description.value: Vitality strikes terror in the undead. When you use a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Heal] spell to damage undead, any undead that fails its saving throw is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1}. If it critically failed, the creature also gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fleeing] condition until the start of your next turn. Mindless undead are not immune to this effect due to being mindless.
